title: Need ADC for duo!
body:
Hi!
In the past week I've managed to climb from s5 to s1, and even though i believe that i will inevitably get to gold and beyond as solo, i think a strong duo would both be more efficient and more fun. Every second game in silver is an automatic win or loss and its driving me insane. please help a poor cow man continue his ambitions to be the best Alistar oce! 

Add my skype: jaketta3

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=MrSunny3,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=0wMLrxR7,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-15T07:11:48.115+0000)
>Every second game in silver is an automatic win or loss and its driving me insane. please help a poor cow man continue his ambitions to be the best Alistar oce! 
> 
> Add my skype: jaketta3

Good luck man, know the feeling.
